edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.battleship

Class BattleshipGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.battleship.BattleshipGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class BattleshipGUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    A gui class for playing battleship.
    Version:
    2.2 (CS56 Winter 2016)
    Author:
    Keenan Reimer, Wenjian Li (working since W14), Chang Rey Tang (W16), Joseph Song (W16)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BattleshipGUI.audioCheck
      Listener for the mute check box audio is muted when checked and unmuted when unchecked
      class  BattleshipGUI.cellClick
      Mouse listener for clicking on game cells
      class  BattleshipGUI.changeOrientation 
      class  BattleshipGUI.colorClick
      Listener for the color selection menu's continue button when the user clicks the button it will move onto the ship size selection menu
      class  BattleshipGUI.colorDropSelect
      Listener for the color selection menu's dropdown button when the user selects a color it will set shipColor to that color
      class  BattleshipGUI.difficultyClick
      Listener for difficulty option buttons
      class  BattleshipGUI.GameGrid
      Inner class that paints the literal GameGrid for the game.
      class  BattleshipGUI.ipEnter
      Listener class for entering IP addresses
      class  BattleshipGUI.mouseMove 
      class  BattleshipGUI.playAgainClick
      Listener for the play again options
      class  BattleshipGUI.sizeClick
      Listener for the ship sizes button once the user clicks the proceed button, texts in the 5 text fields will be check by isValid() method, and if all of them are valid, program will read in the 5 numbers into the shipSizes array and send the message of clicking to GUI
      class  BattleshipGUI.typeClick
      Listener for the type options buttons
